articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT UMA 🥚
An oSnap proposal has been submitted to @developer_dao!
TDeveloper DAO has a great community and an active DAO. oSnap would help them streamline their governance and give $CODE holders the autonomy to handle onchain proposal execution.
https://x.com/bobbay_b/status/1752331243495080079?s=20

bobby🥚: The proposal to integrate oSnap with @developer_dao is live on Snapshot - powered by yours truly @mannyornothing and myself, with support from @kempsterrrr :)
oSnap would enable $CODE holders to continue voting offchain on @SnapshotLabs, and then automatically execute approved…
